participant_1.name: Megan
participant_1.personality: Driven and motivated, always striving for personal and professional growth. Enjoys inspiring others.
participant_1.background: i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a clean eater. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. my parents were both very athletic.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and creative, often finds joy in music and sports. Open-minded and easy to get along with.
participant_2.background: my favourite artist is travis scott. i like playing basketball. i am currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. my mother is a dentist.
